Containers.Name: Bliss
Containers.Description: bliss is a simple and accurate album artwork finder and music meta-data manager.[br][br] [b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Configuration[/span][/u][/b][br] [b]/config[/b] This is where the Bliss configuration and library files will reside[br][br] Don't forget to enter in the host port and the config folder location. [br][br] [span style='color: #E80000;']3220[/span] is the WebUI port[br] To access the Bliss GUI, open the WebUI.[br][br]
Containers.Overview: liss is a simple and accurate album artwork finder. Discover art for rare recordings. Free your art to view anywhere. Update existing art with one click. Configure once, then enjoy.
